1.name: The Shining
1.description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

2.name: Caddyshack
2.description: An exclusive golf course has to deal with a brash new member and a destructive dancing gopher.

3.name: Airplane!
3.description: A man afraid to fly must ensure that a plane lands safely after the pilots become sick.

4.name: The Blues Brothers
4.description: Jake Blues, just out from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and brother Elwood were raised.

5.name: The Blue Lagoon
5.description: In the Victorian period, two children are shipwrecked on a tropical island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together, unaware that sexual maturity will eventually intervene.

6.name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
6.description: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader.

7.name: Friday the 13th
7.description: A group of camp counselors are stalked and murdered by an unknown assailant while trying to reopen a summer camp which, years before, was the site of a child's drowning.

8.name: Flash Gordon
8.description: A football player and his friends travel to the planet Mongo and find themselves fighting the tyranny of Ming the Merciless to save Earth.

9.name: Cannibal Holocaust
9.description: During a rescue mission into the Amazon rainforest, a professor stumbles across lost film shot by a missing documentary crew.

10.name: Raging Bull
10.description: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, who's violence and temper that lead him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

11.name: Popeye
11.description: The adventures of the famous sailor man and his friends in the seaside town of Sweethaven.

12.name: The Elephant Man
12.description: When a prestigious doctor takes on the task of studying a deformed gentlemen known as "the Elephant Man", he finds that the man is quite personable and intelligent.

13.name: Dressed to Kill
13.description: A mysterious blonde woman kills one of a psychiatrist's patients, and then goes after the high-class call girl who witnessed the murder.

14.name: Ordinary People
14.description: The accidental death of the older son of an affluent family deeply strains the relationships among the bitter mother, the good-natured father, and the guilt-ridden younger son.

15.name: Superman II
15.description: Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to start a relationship with Lois Lane, unaware that three Kryptonian criminals he inadvertently released are conquering Earth.

16.name: Xanadu
16.description: A struggling artist living in Los Angeles meets a girl who may hold the key to his happiness.

17.name: Coal Miner's Daughter
17.description: Biographical story of Loretta Lynn, a legendary country singer that came from poverty to worldwide fame. She rose from humble beginnings in Kentucky to superstardom and changing the sound and style of country music forever.

18.name: The Final Countdown
18.description: A modern aircraft carrier is thrown back in time to 1941 near Hawaii, just hours before the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor.

19.name: Heaven's Gate
19.description: A dramatization of the real-life Johnson County War in 1890 Wyoming, in which a Sheriff born into wealth, attempts to protect immigrant farmers from rich cattle interests.

20.name: The Long Riders
20.description: The origins, exploits and the ultimate fate of the Jesse James gang is told in a sympathetic portrayal of the bank robbers made up of brothers who begin their legendary bank raids because of revenge.

21.name: Altered States
21.description: A Harvard scientist conducts experiments on himself with a hallucinatory drug and an isolation chamber that may be causing him to regress genetically.

22.name: The Fog
22.description: An unearthly fog rolls into a small coastal town exactly 100 years after a ship mysteriously sank in its waters.

23.name: Nine to Five
23.description: Three female employees of a sexist, egotistical, lying, hypocritical bigot find a way to turn the tables on him.

24.name: Cruising
24.description: A police detective goes undercover in the underground S&M gay subculture of New York City to catch a serial killer who is preying on gay men.

25.name: Somewhere in Time
25.description: A Chicago playwright uses self-hypnosis to travel back in time and meet the actress whose vintage portrait hangs in a grand hotel.

26.name: Urban Cowboy
26.description: Bud is a young man from the country who learns about life and love in a Houston bar.

27.name: The Changeling
27.description: A man staying at a secluded historical mansion finds himself being haunted by the presence of a spectre.

28.name: My Bodyguard
28.description: When a boy comes to a new school and gets harassed by a bully, he acquires the services of the school's most feared kid as a bodyguard.

29.name: Tom Horn
29.description: An ex-army scout is hired by ranchers to kill cattle rustlers but he gets into trouble with the corrupt local officials when he kills a boy.

30.name: Battle Beyond the Stars
30.description: A young farmer sets out to recruit mercenaries to defend his peaceful planet, which is under threat of invasion by the evil tyrant Sador and his armada of aggressors.

31.name: Alligator
31.description: A baby alligator is flushed down a Chicago toilet and survives by eating discarded laboratory rats injected with growth hormones. The small reptile grows gigantic, escapes the city sewers, and goes on a rampage.

32.name: Motel Hell
32.description: A seemingly friendly farmer and his sister kidnap unsuspecting travelers and bury them alive, using them to create the "special meat" they are famous for.

33.name: The Gods Must Be Crazy
33.description: A comic allegory about a traveling Bushman who encounters modern civilization and its stranger aspects, including a clumsy scientist and a band of revolutionaries.

34.name: Prom Night
34.description: At a high school senior prom, a masked killer stalks four teenagers who were responsible for the accidental death of a classmate six years previously.

35.name: Inferno
35.description: An American college student in Rome and his sister in New York investigate a series of killings in both locations where their resident addresses are the domain of two covens of witches.

36.name: Maniac
36.description: A psychotic man, troubled by his childhood abuse, loose in New York City, kills young women and takes their scalps as his trophies. Will he find the perfect woman in a photographer, and end his killing spree?

37.name: Used Cars
37.description: When the owner of a struggling used car lot is killed, it's up to the lot's hot-shot salesman to save the property from falling into the hands of the owner's ruthless brother and used-car rival.

38.name: Fame
38.description: A chronicle of the lives of several teenagers who attend a New York high school for students gifted in the performing arts.

39.name: Humanoids from the Deep
39.description: Scientific experiments backfire and produce horrific mutations: half man, half fish, which terrorize a small fishing village by killing the men and raping the women.

40.name: The Long Good Friday
40.description: An up-and-coming gangster is tested by the insurgence of an unknown, very powerful threat.

41.name: The Dogs of War
41.description: Mercenary James Shannon, on a reconnaissance job to the African nation of Zangaro, is tortured and deported. He returns to lead a coup.

42.name: Brubaker
42.description: The new warden of a small prison farm in Arkansas tries to clean it up of corruption after initially posing as an inmate.

43.name: Little Darlings
43.description: Two fifteen year-old girls from different sides of the tracks compete to see who will be first to lose their virginity while at camp.

44.name: Mangiati vivi!
44.description: A young woman teams up with an adventurer to find her missing sister in the jungles of New Guinea and they stumble upon a religious cult led by a deranged preacher whom has located his commune in an area inhabited by cannibals.

45.name: Kagemusha
45.description: A petty thief with an utter resemblance to a samurai warlord is hired as the lord's double. When the warlord later dies the thief is forced to take up arms in his place.

46.name: Saturn 3
46.description: Two lovers stationed at a remote base in the asteroid fields of Saturn are intruded upon by a retentive technocrat from Earth and his charge: a malevolent eight foot robot.

47.name: Death Ship
47.description: A mysterious ghostly freighter rams and sinks a modern day cruise ship whose survivors climb aboard the freighter and discover that it is a World War II Nazi torture vessel.

48.name: American Gigolo
48.description: A Los Angeles male escort, who mostly caters to an older female clientèle, is accused of a murder which he did not commit.

49.name: The Mirror Crack'd
49.description: Miss Marple comes to solve the mystery when a local woman is poisoned and a visiting movie star seems to have been the intended victim.

50.name: Any Which Way You Can
50.description: A trucker turned prize fighter, his brother and their pet orangutan have a series of misadventures involving the mob, corrupt cops, motorcycle gangs and pretty dames.
